name: unproblematic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
Something that is unproblematic does not cause any problems or disagreement: The whole process was simple and unproblematic. not unproblematic He admits that this approach is not unproblematic. Opposite
problematic
More examplesFewer examplesIt is fairly unproblematic to predict the number of older people in the population at a given future point in time.In most cases, the transition was brief, if not entirely unproblematic. While parents provide a lifeline for many women in financial difficulty, they are not always an unproblematic source of help.
